mdRecord.dcterms:title: T. Alfred Yeatts Cemetery
mdRecord.dcterms:description:
Located in the corner of a field 160 yards off the intersection of Franklin Pike and Cannady Gap Rd. NE. It is visible from Franklin Pike. Turn onto Cannady Gap Rd. NE and proceed 160 yards to a gate on the right (just before the road makes a 90' turn), The cemetery is on a small rise a few yards beyond the gate. It is visible using Google Earth.
N 36 56.095' W 80 13.264'
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Lists
Cemeteries
